name: Interplanetary Golf
description:
It's golf, but in a tiny solar system. My first attempt at a Ludum Dare, and honestly one of my first real attempts at a game in general.

  • W,A,S,D to rotate the camera around the ball, and Q,E to roll
  • Hold Space to charge up a swing, release to launch the ball. Use gravity - or brute force - to get the ball into the glowing zone near the flag.
  • Hold R to reset if you get stuck or lost.

There are 3 holes in total, one on each planet.
